item.title: Labor Day Mixdown C-89.5fm
item.description: Yet again I am motivated by Seattles badass radio station.... C-89.5fm (across the globe at www.c895worldwide.com). 10 local DJ's playing 1hour sets on the radio all day long for Labor Day & I get the honor of being one of them. Thank you again to C-89.5 for their contribution to dance music & thanks to Max Corona (Mad Maxx) for the opportunity. I hope you all can enjoy the mix & be sure to direct all your friends to download from Podomatic & Brady K.
item.dc:creator: DJ BRADY K

I hope you all can enjoy the mix & be sure to direct all your friends to download from Podomatic & Brady K.

item.title: 30 min 4th of July radio set
item.description: Another radio set pre-recorded & then played on July 4th at 3:30 pm on C-89.5fm & streamed at www.c895worldwide.com. Thanks to Max Corona for inviting me to play the 4th of July for the past 3 years on C-89.5. There are some tracks you may recognize from previous recordings but all in all a dope little mix. Hope you enjoy. Brady K
item.dc:creator: DJ BRADY K
item.itunes:summary:

Brady K

item.title: The Overdrive on C-89.5fm
item.description: I was asked to throw together this mix (thanks to Speedy G!) to be played (2/13/10 at 2am) on the Overdrive.... a weekly radio show broadcast by Seattles hottest music station C-89.5fm & streamed worldwide at http://c895worldwide.com. The show is hosted by C-89's DJ Lifeguard & runs every Friday from 1am-3am playing mixes from local & international electronic DJ's. Seattle is really fortunate to have such a great opportunity for local DJ's to make mixes for & to play live on the radio. Thank you again to C-89.5fm, for their continued hospitality & I hope you enjoy the mix! Brady K
item.dc:creator: DJ BRADY K
item.itunes:summary:

Brady K

item.title: Into The Deep
item.description: This is my first ever recorded deep house mix. I've been building a collection of deep house for awhile now & felt like it was time to let everyone else enjoy some of the ear pleasing goodness of my deep house collection. 100% all vinyl play with zero editing. The way house DJ's were meant to play. Yeah that means me playing RECORDS live without the aid of expensive & complex software. I know..... weird huh...? Brady K
item.dc:creator: DJ BRADY K
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: "The best of 2007" live on "THE VORTEX"
item.description: I had the honor of being chosen as one of "The best of 2007" on "The Vortex" a weekly (Sat. 8pm-2am) specialty radio show on C-89.5fm or http://www.c895worldwide.com broadcast here in Seattle WA by the Northwests one & only Drew Bailey. Thanks to Drew & C-89.5fm for this choosing me & for recording this podcast. Hope you enjoy! Brady K

item.title: Brady K---live in the mix on "THE VORTEX"
item.description: A live 1 hour radio set on "The Vortex" a weekly (Sat. 8pm-2am)specialty show on C-89.5fm  broadcast here in Seattle WA by the Northwests one & only Drew Bailey. Hosting the best electronic DJ's locally & abroad live every week. Brady K

item.title: Brady K--------Case-of-bass
item.description: I recently came across this mix that I made a couple years ago.... Thought there were some good house tracks on it & it was worth giving others a chance to listen too. May it hit you in the good foot!!! ENJOY!! Brady K

item.title: Brady K___sHorT bUs___
item.description: Another older mix of mine. 80+ minutes of dope house music. Recorded at the end of one of those never ending weekends. Zero editing & 100% all vinyl play, as usual. ENJOY! Brady K
item.dc:creator: DJ BRADY K
